summary: Page 52 (book page 72) captures sections נג through נז plus continuation fragment and grouping header מתנת שכר. Structure is mostly correct. Some text inaccuracies in OCR body text. The makor source ref for section נז is missing (continues to next page).

issues.description: OCR text 'ינוויי ג"כ היום ברכה' appears wrong. The image shows 'ירוויי ג"כ היום ברכה' (with ר not נ).

The makor paragraph for section נז is missing its source_ref. The text continues to page 53 where the continuation fragment has source_ref 'תולדות יצחק בחוקותי'. Since this is a continues_to situation, the null source_ref is understandable but should be noted.
issues.corrected_text: source_ref resolves to 'תולדות יצחק בחוקותי' from continuation on page 53

issues.description: Source ref 'שנות חיים פ' חיי' - image is hard to read precisely. May be 'שנות חיים פ"ח חי"ש' or similar abbreviation.
Some minor OCR variations in the continuation text. 'ומילת בחוקותי' should likely be 'ומלת בחוקותי'.
